tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very convenient in booking an appointment.  Doctor is always available when it's needed.  Very much nominal cost for the treatment and the quality of treatment very much at par to any other Posh clinic outside who put all their expenses on their patients.  Dr Sivashankari explains in detail regarding your problem and spends enough time for you to take your decision.  They don't over load the clinic with patients which one more major plus for a dental clinic where your  waiting time is very minimal.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
First of all, I would like to thank the doctors at Harsini Dental clinic, who cared for and followed the schedule for my treatment plan for the past 2 years.
Ortho Dr.’s Visited this clinic based on their availability. I am not sure of their names, but 3 Dr.’s visited and I got treatment from them during my course for the past 2 years since it was a long journey. Saturday was my regular monthly appointment. All are comfortable to me. Although Ortho Dr's is on a move, Harsini dental clinic holds the bond to care for and satisfy the patients.
I need to be honest like, I never keep up my timings, sometimes I skipped/ I would be available at the station. Even though I would get reminder calls from the Clinic. One day the Dr. Waited for me till 10:30 pm since I need to travel the very next day.
Thank you so much Dr. I am amazed to see the transformation of my teeth. I am much more confident than before.
The alignment of my teeth and the front profile were totally changed and gave a new looks to my face with a smile.
I strongly recommend my Friends and Colleagues. Keep up your good work.
thanks

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: As iam new to chennai, iam in dilemma to select the best dental clinic.  one of my relative referred Dr.Sivasankari at mugappair. Even though iam in vadapalani, Got appointment and visited in evening slot at mogappair - harsini dental clinic. Dr.took sufficient time to explain with models,very much acceptable conversation went and finally Dr solved my tooth problems in consecutive appointment. Thanks to team.
reply_text: Thank you very much for your response..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My 3Yrs of experience with the Braces & the Clinic

Close to 1 yr was standstill during corona plus 3-4 months were passed on consultations with diff. orthodontist & also there were transitions in Dr.'s before & after corona. Orthodontist are the one who specialises in the diagnosis, prevention & correction of teeth, jaws in our case it's concerned with the braces. Here the orthodontist is arranged and he visits the clinic once a month. ** ************ *** * ******** **** My advice is to find an clinic(For Braces)where the Dr. is specialised in orthodontics, *** ******* ***** ** *** ****** ***** it's time taking procedure some may end up removing the braces in years time while some may be even take years together depending upon the complexity, if one finds the clinic with the Dr. specialised in it, everyone can have their customised schedule, can visit Dr. anyday rather in an day of strict schedule & interval of. visits and duration of the process would be short, some orthodontics follow shorter intervals b/w visits. Also in case of uneven circumstances of breakage in between it could be easy to fix, while in here if any mishap happens you should suppose the contact the clinic, the clinic consults with the specialist obtains it's approval, and would plan as per the convenience of both, it's cumbersome & Expensive. The appointments were initimated to patients on close call there would be a call days before of the appointment and that's it, you're supposed to remind of the date & time and plan with the schedule , initially even this system was poorly managed, adapting to their schedule was quite a challenge, in the last 6-8 months the clinic's integration with the Practo, uplifted the clinic .practo reminds patients of the appointments regularly, after the clinic updates their status with practo, after consultant(orthodontist) opinions are sought out. Practo did an splendid job . The prices have soared in these 3Yrs. drastically and I find it quite high for their service.

The package cost was fixed initially, whilst 50% were paid initially and rest through installments of 10% in every months visit. I requested the Dr. for the bill but it was prolonged till the last day. Everytime I would ask for the bill, there would be an excuse from the Dr. it was initially I have asked for the bill after the 1st installment i.e after 60% , bcos. it's hard to keep track of the installments during corona has there were long intervals in between, an acknowledgment would suffice but this isn't honored the Dr. said the bill will be given only after the complete payment of installments . So, I patiently traveled with the course and asked for the bill after the completion of payment & now I was said that the bill would be given after the completion of procedure. And so it was on the last day I was given the bill. It's everyone right to ask for the bill & should be honored. The clinic also didn't keep up with the time for some(4-5) visits the waiting period was so long, 30 mins to 1.5Hrs.

Initial days were glorious days with the clinic but it doesn't last long. I regret for choosing this clinic. Hope my experience would lend way for the beginners.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited for Tooth pain with broken part of my tooth. Dr. examined throughly and explained the root cause. Brief explanation on dental plan and procedure was very useful for me to decide. The treatment went well,  RCT, and crown fixation done and got my tooth restored. thank you DR.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had a severe pain in my wisdom teeth. I visited the clinic for a consultation. The doctor explained the problem after examining my teeth. So then I gone for a root canal, and had a cap over it. Now I'm able to eat whatever I want without any pain. 
I very happy and satisfied with the treatment and it's really worthy. 
Even I recommend my friends for this clinic..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Its was on Sunday. most of the clinic are closed, i searched and found via practo. unbearable tooth pain for me. when i called them the clinic timing was over. Since its an emergency for me, Dr. Sivasankari  attended my case. such a polite approach i was very happy with the treatment.

even after clinic hours i called here few times for my doubts. she replied well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Visited Harsini dental clinic , Dr.Sivasankari for my teeth related problem. I had few missing teeth in lower jaw, suggested for implant supported denture.
Dr.Sivasankari was well cooperative with me. procedure went smoothly.
money worth for my treatment. i compared  the fee for this treatment with others and found this as my best option.  i strongly recommend to my friends and relatives. i have introduced my family members too. Now she is our family dentist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Today I visited and this is purely based on the feedback.. actually I went there for tooth decay issue. She had a initial look on my teeth decay based on that she said there are two things , first one would be normal removal of teeth decay and second would be root canal. Again these options depend on how deeply impacted. After removing the teeth decay she said that it impacted little deeply and removed everything. Finally went for filling.. charged only 500 rs. Note: I didnot opted for laser filling. She just took around 45 minutes to complete all the process. Really i bothered how long this process will take. But within 45 minutes she had done a great job. Overall I am happy with her performance for tooth decay.  The people who are looking for dental clinic please visit there.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I have no idea on her skills and experience as attended only one session. 
But she is little rude and scary.
reply_text:
Thank you for your less experienced review. Whichever clinic you visit, you need to follow the clinic procedure. We are maintaining patients record from the day one... it is unfair to say "nowadays dentist also started to collect patients record and it is not followed in your city Kumbakonam" . 

No point in questioning our routine. Dr. has explained on the reason for your pain and advised to take xray. Then it is upto you to deceide.
Thank you.

tags: None
review: Don't go... very worse experience....  **** **** **** **** without any treatment and not even provide and prescription advice... just pay the money and leave.. that's it..
reply_text:
Thanks your reply. 

Your Practo appointment was booked at 2:00 pm and you have arrived at 3:00 pm that too on Sundays we do consulting only on appointment basis. 
You have enquired for the Gap closing for your wife, which cannot be done as you suggested us like applying paste Or any material to fill it. We have given the right solution for you which is Recommendable. 

We gave the possibility options to choose for treatment, since you are not interested we left options to you to decide for the treatment. 
You told me you will decide and come back. 

No treatment was done yesterday, The consulting charges are clearly mentioned. We collected the consulting charges only. 
Without any medication required, how can we give the prescription. 

Thank you.

tags: None
review: Went for a normal tooth pluck, the whole clinic was empty, ** *** **** ** ** ******** **** charged 3500rs , ******* *** ***** ******* **** ***** ***** ****** by seeing the consultation fee thought will be a genuine dentist, but it will be our first and last visit.
reply_text:
Good evening Madam, it is very surprise to see the comment section. It was not a normal tooth removal. It is removal of impacted tooth. For the removal of Impacted tooth our standard charge is charged to you. We have taken a Digital x-ray and that was also not charged against your fee. 
We charged consulting fee and impacted tooth removal fee.  Thank you.
